channel.title: Mental Health on Sam's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Mental Health on Sam's Blog

item.title: Student Body Blues
item.description: Before I begin, please do not misinterpret me: I do not care for the life of every individual that comprises the Florida Atlantic Student body. To be very clear, when I look around me and see only dilapidated and demotivated faces, my first thought is not to help every single one I see, but to analyze why they feel the way they do and to avoid the cause of their suffering at all costs.
